channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Waymo Catches World Model Fever, and the Only Prescription Is More World Models
item.description: What happens if a Waymo runs into an elephant? The world model knows.

item.title: ICE Agent's ‘Dragging’ Case May Help Expose Evidence in Renee Good Shooting
item.description: The government has withheld details of the investigation of Renee Good's killing—but an unrelated case involving the ICE agent who shot her could force new revelations.

item.title: Crypto.com Founder Buys AI.com in ‘Largest Domain Purchase in History’
item.description: Is this what a frothy bubble looks like?

item.title: It just got easier for Claude to check in on your WordPress site
item.description: WordPress users can now leverage Claude to analyze web traffic or find information about other internal site metrics.

item.title: New Voice Assistants Are Officially a Whiff (for Now)
item.description: Even with the full rollout of Amazon's Alexa+ and Google's Gemini for Home, it feels like we're still shouting into the void.

item.title: ‘Marriage Toxin’ Is Bringing Romance to Shonen in a Big Way
item.description: An adult cast romance about a poison assassin seeking love loosely riffing on 'Naruto' is about as peak‑shonen a premise as you can get.

item.title: How to watch 2026 Winter Olympics highlights — it's *FREE*
item.description: Here's our guide on how to watch the 2026 Winter Olympics for free on BBC iPlayer no matter where you are in the world.

item.title: Apple will reportedly allow third-party AI assistants in CarPlay
item.description: Apple plans to allow third-party voice-controlled AI apps in CarPlay, Bloomberg reports. Siri is the default voice assistant for things like controlling music and looking up directions, but future AI apps in CarPlay could handle the complicated, open-ended requests Siri can't answer.The expanded support would let developers like OpenAI or Google offer versions of their ChatGPT and Gemini apps for CarPlay. Similar functionality is possible just by connecting a smartphone to a car over Bluetooth and using an AI app's voice mode, but CarPlay support would presumably make the process a little more...

item.title: Apple might let you use ChatGPT from CarPlay
item.description: CarPlay users could soon be able to use their chatbot of choice instead of Siri. As Bloomberg reports, Apple is working to add support for CarPlay voice control apps from OpenAI, Anthropic, Google, and others. Previously, users who wanted to access third-party chatbots in the car would need to go through their iPhone, but soon […]

item.title: This is the Trump Phone
item.description: Where's the Trump phone? We're going to keep talking about it every week. We've reached out, as usual, to ask about the Trump phone's whereabouts. This time, surprisingly, we received a response - and an interview. The Trump phone is real - maybe, sort of, soon? - and I've seen it. Not in the flesh, […]

item.title: South Korean Crypto Exchange Accidentally Gave Away $43 Billion Worth of Paper Bitcoin
item.description: Now that is a promotion.

item.title: Prince Andrew advisor pitched Jeffrey Epstein on investing in EV startups like Lucid Motors
item.description: The mysterious businessman pitched Jeffrey Epstein on numerous mobility startups in an era when the sector was white hot, according to TechCrunch's review of hundreds of documents released by the Department of Justice.

item.title: What will Nvidia think? Intel CEO confirms GPU building will continue as it looks to stake a claim in the most lucrative industry around right now
item.description: Intel confirms internal GPU development, hires key engineers, and aims to challenge Nvidia in high-performance AI and gaming markets.

item.title: RFK Jr. Has Packed an Autism Panel With Cranks and Conspiracy Theorists
item.description: Among those Robert F. Kennedy Jr. recently named to a federal autism committee are people who tout dangerous treatments and say vaccine manufacturers are “poisoning children.”

item.title: ‘Starfleet Academy’ Eulogized What Mattered Most About Captain Sisko
item.description: This week's stellar episode of the new 'Star Trek' series looked back at the legacy left behind by the captain of 'Deep Space Nine' and found the best perspective it could.

item.title: Worried about winter EV range loss? Brutal test reveals the 10 hardiest models you can buy –and Tesla only just made the list
item.description: The Norwegian Automotive Federation tested some of the top-selling EVs to see how they performed in extreme weather conditions.

item.title: The HR exec from the Coldplay kiss cam incident is headlining a crisis PR conference
item.description: Individual tickets start at $875 a person. Kristin Cabot, the HR exec at the center of last year’s Coldplay kiss cam scandal, is headlining a crisis communications conference happening later this year.

item.title: Vivian Tu on how to spot good financial advice in an uncertain economy
item.description: The financial educator and creator behind Your Rich BFF shares what to watch for online, and why volatility distorts decision-making. Why does uncertainty make us less rational with money? And who should we trust for financial advice online? Vivian Tu, financial educator and CEO of Your Rich BFF, breaks down today’s personal finance risks and opportunities, from “lifestyle inflation” and the most common money mistakes smart people make to how Gen Z is navigating 2026 volatility and a shifting job market....

item.title: Why People Think Jeffrey Epstein Is Alive and Playing Fortnite
item.description: There's no evidence that Epstein is alive and hiding in Israel.

item.title: Something Mysteriously Powerful Slammed Into Earth in 2023. Scientists Now Have a Theory
item.description: The science here gets really dark.

item.title: Disney+ loses access to Dolby Vision in some European countries
item.description: Disney+ subscribers in some European countries have lost access to advanced HDR features like Dolby Vision, TechRadar and FlatpanelsHD report. The issue was first spotted by German Disney+ subscribers on Reddit, but currently also impacts subscribers in Portugal, Poland, France and the Netherlands, according to FlatpanelsHD."Dolby Vision support for content on Disney+ is currently unavailable in several European countries due to technical challenges," Disney said in a statement. "We are actively working to restore access to Dolby Vision and will provide an update as soon as possible. 4K UHD an...

item.title: Finally, I’ve Found the Perfect Switch 2 Controller
item.description: Gulikit's TT Pro and TT Max have many more stick and button options than a Switch 2 Pro controller, and they have one feature no other gamepad does.
